page.title: 03THE DANGERS OF GARBOLE ROAD
page.content: When you go up the Garbole road you will encounter quite few dangers.250m up the road you will see an old track going off on the left hand side of the road.On the right hand side of that road is a big box with a small box beside it.Explosives are in the big and detonators in the small box.There is a warning sign beside the boxes. Further on up the Garbole road past the loch,at the end of the track to the left of Gaich there is a river. Over the river there is a bridge made by the scouts who camp there in summer.The bridge is unsafe now with the flooring broken in various places along the bridge.If you want to go there and cross it take someone else, and be careful. Along the Garbole road past Gaich there is a power station.There you will have to be careful too.
